rows.label: qst201508_msg0001
rows.name:
Mo? Tolulu's employer's research?
Friends want to know about that, mo?

rows.label: qst201508_msg0002
rows.name:
S-Sorry, but Tolulu is only in
charge of his personal care, so
Tolulu knows n-nothing, mo...

rows.label: qst201508_msg0003
rows.name:
Tolulu knows nothing at
all, so please leave, mo!

rows.label: qst201508_msg0004
rows.name:
Mo-mo...?! Why Tolulu feel so
much Nopon pressure, mo...?

rows.label: qst201508_msg0008
rows.name:
Friends will keep what
Tolulu says a secret, mo?

rows.label: qst201508_msg0009
rows.name:
Tolulu's employer is a
botanist named Lapacoll, mo.

rows.label: qst201508_msg0010
rows.name:
He's always cooped up in his
room, but he opens the door
only when Tolulu comes, mo.

rows.label: qst201508_msg0011
rows.name:
The signal is to knock 16 times,
mo. It hurts Tolulu's hands a
little, but you should try it, mo.

rows.label: qst201508_msg0012
rows.name:
What Tolulu said is an
absolute secret, mo!

rows.label: qst201508_msg0014
rows.name:
Since Tolulu is getting paid, Tolulu
will not leak information, mo!
